attributes.action: Give father's equal rights to their children with contact. Holidays. Schooling
attributes.background: I have seen and heard how parents can use the children as pawns against each other in regards to contact. I think this is bad parenting and does not help children in the future to manage a relationships in the social society. I just hope things can be right for the benefit of their future.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104683
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
